tool_description: Meta Threads Post Downloader with Caption. Effortlessly save videos, images, GIFs, and more along with their original captions using just the post URL. Elevate your content experience and explore the threads of creativity like never before.
name: Threads Downloader(Scraper) - API
title: Threads Downloader(Scraper) - API

api_list.name: Profile Information
api_list.description:
This endpoint allows you to retrieve essential details from public threads effortlessly. Obtain valuable information such as the user's Username, Name, Bio, Followers count, and even their Profile Picture. Streamline your data collection process with ease and accuracy, all from public profiles."

This description highlights the key features and data points that your API can extract from public profiles.

api_list.name: Post Downloader
api_list.description:
Our Post Scraping API enables users to extract content from public post links effortlessly. Simply replace the query in your post link to initiate the process. It ensures downloads only for public posts and provides a positive response. Safely and efficiently gather data by entering public post URLs.

NB: Only public post will get positive response.
